text: Mba Rom gari guman pan mba kama havhareŋ ndi tɨgav khaŋ nzuai, “Nde kha Roman guman pan gari ŋguir ki gumgi gu mbigi, nde ŋgɨp tamtam harigi ŋguir kɨv, nde taagi ŋgɨp wari wo nzɨgi gum ndegi kegi ŋgu nɨɨŋgera ŋgegɨrim, Rom gari guman pan zɨv nde zɨri ndirga.” Mbe maaŋ suaŋgim, mbe taagia wari wo ŋguir vui.
